Package aleph.dir.home

Interface Summary
Constants Constants used by default transaction manager.
 

Class Summary
ClientSide Home based directory manager
Keeps track of locally-cached global objects.
HomeDirectory Home Based Directory implementation.
ReleaseRequest Server to client message asking for object back.
ReleaseResponse Message client -> server returning object.
RetrieveRequest Message client -> server requesting object.
RetrieveResponse Server grants object to client.
ServerSide Keeps track of each global object's location and status.
